mapper.select: select count(*) from user_tables where table_name='FASP_T_MGDICTABLE'
select count(*) from user_tables where table_name='FASP_T_MGDICCOLUMN'
select count(*) from user_tables where table_name='FASP_T_DICDS'
mapper.update: create table FASP_T_DICDS ( guid VARCHAR2(32) not null, code VARCHAR2(50), name VARCHAR2(100), elementcode VARCHAR2(100), alias VARCHAR2(100), apply VARCHAR2(1), codemode VARCHAR2(32), publishname VARCHAR2(32), remark VARCHAR2(1000), status CHAR(1), createtime VARCHAR2(17), starttime VARCHAR2(17), endtime VARCHAR2(17), province VARCHAR2(9), year CHAR(4), version NUMBER(9), typeguid VARCHAR2(32), tablecode VARCHAR2(32), crc VARCHAR2(32), isexporttranslate VARCHAR2(1), exportranslateguidformat VARCHAR2(32), isacrossfiscal VARCHAR2(1), acrossfiscalformat VARCHAR2(32), cachetype VARCHAR2(1), ispublic VARCHAR2(1), transactioncache VARCHAR2(1), codetyep VARCHAR2(1), dbversion TIMESTAMP(6), importstandard VARCHAR2(255), isnormversion CHAR(1) )

create table FASP_T_MGDICTABLE ( YEAR VARCHAR2(20), PROVINCE VARCHAR2(20), TABLECODE VARCHAR2(200) , NAME VARCHAR2(500), REMARK VARCHAR2(1000), TABLETYPE NUMBER(2) , VERSION NUMBER(9) , DBTABNAME VARCHAR2(30) , APPID VARCHAR2(50) , EXP VARCHAR2(10), TABLEPART VARCHAR2(100), ISSHOW NUMBER(1), DBIMPFLAG VARCHAR2(1), ISSYS NUMBER(1), ISUSES NUMBER(1), VIEWTABLENAME VARCHAR2(100), DBVERSION TIMESTAMP(6), DATASYNC NUMBER(1), HASTRIGGER NUMBER(1), SYNCCLASSNAME VARCHAR2(500), STATUS CHAR(1) )

create table FASP_T_MGDICCOLUMN ( DEID VARCHAR2(50), CSID VARCHAR2(50), EXP VARCHAR2(50), ISSYS VARCHAR2(10), DBCOLUMNCODE VARCHAR2(100), ISUSES VARCHAR2(1), YEAR CHAR(4), PROVINCE VARCHAR2(50), COLUMNID VARCHAR2(100), COLUMNCODE VARCHAR2(100), TABLECODE VARCHAR2(100), NAME VARCHAR2(200), DATATYPE VARCHAR2(50), DATALENGTH VARCHAR2(50), SCALE NUMBER(2), VERSION NUMBER(9), NULLABLE NUMBER(2) default 1, DEFAULTVALUE VARCHAR2(255), DBVERSION TIMESTAMP(6) )
mapper.delete: delete from fasp_t_mgdiccolumn where tablecode = #{tablecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and columncode = #{columncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: create table FASP_T_DIC3SYNCDS ( ELEMENTCODE VARCHAR2(100), TABLENAME VARCHAR2(50), SYNCDATETIME VARCHAR2(50) )
mapper.select: select ELEMENTCODE,code as TABLENAME from FASP_T_DICds t where t.elementcode not in (select elementcode from FASP_T_DIC3SYNCDS) and t.status in ('1','2')
mapper.delete: delete from FASP_T_DIC3SYNCDS where elementcode not in (select elementcode from FASP_T_DICDS)
mapper.select: select dbcolumncode,datatype,datalength from FASP_T_MGDICCOLUMN where tablecode=#{tablecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update fasp_t_dicds set tablecode=#{tablecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ELEMENTCODE=#{elementcode ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: create or replace view ${view} as select * from ${table} t where year = global_multyear_cz.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('YEAR') and province = global_multyear_cz.Secu_f_GLOBAL_PARM('DIVID') and status !='3'
